titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Eggington in the county of Darby concerning the right vse of things indifferent, the 3. day of August, 1596. By Symon Presse minister there.
titleStmt.author: Presse, Symon, b. 1558 or 9.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, and are to bee solde [by J. Broome, London] in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Bible,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yard at the signe of the Bible
